alert.note: Alert for Gila Bend (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 1:16AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 145 AM MST... At 116 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Big Horn, or 18 miles southeast of Gila Bend, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gila Bend, Estrella, Bosque, Sonoran National Monument and Big Horn. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 117 and 137. AZ Route 238 between mile markers 1 and 17. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
